title: FDLP-Ecuador: No to popular consultation!
content:
No to popular consultation!

heFebruary 26, 2024



He Government is preparing to make a popular consultation that, if approved, It will definitely plunge the masses, the workers of the countryside and the city, in a more abject labor exploitation condition.

Noboa An internal war was invented to justify the country's delivery to Yankee imperialism. To be able to specify, additionally, to «conflict internal »had to declare an emergency that has been prolonged by 30 more days; In this way, together with the FFAA they have created an environment of unrestricted "need" of the intervention of the state repressive apparatus with The purpose of maintaining "order and peace." What has you achieved with this? Capture About 10,000 citizens, some linked to criminal gangs, majority, settlers of poor neighborhoods, (false positives), intimidate the leaders of popular organizations; condition what the Assembly and certain elements of opposition to the regime from the stage bureaucratic and deliver, in silver tray, the structure and planning of everything concerning the PFFAA, police and external/internal security of the country To imperialism.

But Everything is a hoax. There is no job, there are no resources to pay salaries, poor medical care; Not for crime, corruption. Military and police involved with the bands; There is an increase in VAT, and, Definitely a speculative waterfall exposed in the dramatic increase in the cost of the basic basket.

Thousands of Ecuadorians "flee" of the economic crisis to other countries, it is no longer a simple emigration, it is an exodus that determines: live, or die, since many Compatriots have been prey to crime on the way to the US. Incredibly, like the banking crisis of the end of the last century, the Remittance income, have become one of the three main "Contributions" that nourish the GDP of the country.

TO What does the query point? Mainly, to strengthen the repressive response, punitive and prison of the government. Deliver more powers than you already have The FFAA. It aims to legalize drug trafficking and crime capital Organized. But are the three billion dollars that enter the Financial circuit of the country product of drug trafficking, especially to bank, They are no longer regular?

The Consulta promotes openness to foreign investment, but does not subject national laws, but of "international arbitration" in case of controversies. The latest conditions of the so -called "foreign investment" is delivered to the international legislation that responds to the interests of the great monopolies, financial centers and imperialist property.

Insist About extradition. They have created a "false environment" about it. A Patraña more, a offender, to be extradited, must have committed a Crime that directly affects another country. It is obvious that there the Addressing is basically political. They vaccinate imperialism in the country before potential reactions against its armed presence in National territory. They also go for hardening penalties. Other stupidity, a criminal, including those of "white collar", never committed Thinking about losing, not succeeding, then, the sorrows do the same.

By Last, reform the Labor Code. They want to favor entrepreneurs and Patterns Stupidity. To hell the work conquests that are has started the ruling classes and the old state based on struggle; many of them, about death, mutilation, imprisonment, torture of hundreds of workers who generously delivered their lives by materialize those conquests and defend their rights.

You Definitive? an inecessary, punitive consultation, prisoner, entertain, I don't abound nada with relationship with social bids such as: Education, Health, social security, etc.

AND In the midst of that tramoya, Noboa manifests; "Possibly, I introduce myself to the re-election". But it does not go alone, to the tail, the last elector follows him Farm, Rabascal, Gonzales and, without surprising us at all, Leónidas Iza.

HE The popular consultation comes. Do not vote, do not participate in them. It's not enough With saying, "everything not in the consultation" as the revisionism, which are the same that say “52% of the electoral population He is to blame for what we live, because he voted for Noboa. ” No, those follow tied to the elections, they continue to think that this is the way to solve The problems of the masses, of the poor peasants.

Must unmask opportunism, revisionism, electorable They insist and persist on the bureaucratic path. We must fight them in All possible planes. Do not participate in the consultation, boycott it in All possible forms. That is the slogan of the people.

ORGANIZE, Fight and resist!

ONLY Rights and freedoms are conquered with fights!
